examples.example: 这档电视节目真是一档非常精彩且富有意义的节目。

translate.english: This TV program is really a very wonderful and meaningful program.

examples.example: 这一档综艺节目充满了欢乐和惊喜，让人看得津津有味。

translate.english: This variety show is full of joy and surprises, making people watch it with relish.

examples.example: 我制作的一档短视频在网络上获得了很多好评。

translate.english: A short video I made has received a lot of good comments on the Internet.
